description:
The PAS or personal anchor system gives you a safe, adjustable alternative to securing yourself with slings or quickdraws. Let's be clear here, this is a personal tether only and it is not CE or UIAA certified for catching any kind of fall.

  • Made of super-compact 11mm Dyneema monster sling webbing
  • Eliminates the risk of pocket failure inherent in daisy chains
  • Strength is 12kN
  • Length is 93cm
name: Metolius Alpine PAS Personal Anchor
